text: Alain Barrière (born Alain Bellec; 18 November 1935 – 18 December 2019) was a Breton-French pop singer. He was active from the 1950s until his death and was known for participating in the 1963 Eurovision Song Contest for his hit song "Elle était si jolie"."Elle était si jolie" at diggiloo.net Barrière was born in La Trinité-sur-Mer, Brittany, France. Barrière died of cardiac arrest in Carnac, France on 18 December 2019 at the age of 84. ==References== ==Other websites== * Alain Barrière's website * Discography and cover art at encyclopédisque.fr Category:1935 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from cardiac arrest Category:French pop singers Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants Category:People from Morbihan
title: Alain Barrière
